name: dubtrack.fm - Chat ranks
description: If you wanted to know who is what while in chat, now you can! Requires DubX!
additional_info: Introduction This is a derivative of my Large chat ranks style I published earlier. Simplified, yet equally as functional for people who want to know who does what in a community. Bugs I don't know if DubX can handle customizing admins in chat yet, so that isn't in there. Soon to be updated whenever I find out! GitHub release For integration into your community's theme, get it here.
